item.description:
This is so that we can have an accurate number to make renovations for dinner. Please take the time to say yes, if you would like to join us for dinner before the Booty Vortex show. If you would like to join us for dinner, but don't want to dance the night away, your also welcome to say yes. The more the merrier!!!

If your new & don't know anybody else in our group, please let us know so that we can be on the lookout for you.
item.how_to_find_us: Lets meet inside in the waiting area. I'll be wearing a rainbow hair comb.
item.name: Dinner before Booty Vortex
